short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that enables you to share your screen during a 1:1 video Call.

The Jostle Screen Sharing extension enables you to share your screen during a 1:1 video Callâ€”within the privacy of your Jostle intranet. Present ideas, collaborate, and connect with your coworkers.
